configChromaKeyHelp: Renders OSD above a <0>magenta background</0> rather than the actual video. The DVR video is still used (currently) for timing purposes, though.
fileDropHelp: You can drop any of your files here, or click to select them individually.
noteConfigLink: Configure this in the Package Manager.
noteHeader: OSD recording is an opt-in feature on the goggle side.
noteWarning: Any video files used must come directly from the goggles, with no modifications.
